revision.text:
{{Infobox XC3 Status |title = Damage Link |caption = Relays dmg. taken to nearby allies. |image = XC3 Damage Link.png |type = Debuff |attribute = Ether |base-duration = 15.0s |max-duration = 30.0s |success-rate = 100% |rng-applicable = No |effect-title-1 = Base Link Radius |effect-value-1 = 5m }} '''Damage Link''' is a [[Status Effect]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. Whenever a character affected by this debuff is damaged, nearby allies of that character will take the same amount of damage as they had.
The amount of damage relayed is unaffected by equipment that increases debuff power; instead increasing debuff power only increases the radius over which damage is shared. ==Distribution== ===Arts=== *[[Sword of Valor]] ([[Yumsmith]]) *[[Sharpest Tool]] ([[Riku & Manana]])
[[Category:XC3 Status]] [[Category:XC3FR Status]]
{{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}}

[[File:XC3 Slack-Jawed Zephal.png|thumb|Slack-Jawed Zephal]] '''Darbuses''' are a family of bipedal reptilian-like enemies in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}.
== {{XC3|-}} == === Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Bigges Darbus]] * [[Lognate Darbus]] * [[Rabejan Darbus]] * [[Warriod Darbus]]
=== Unique Monsters === * [[Fang-King Clavein]] * [[Slack-Jawed Zephal]]
=== Quest Exclusive Boss === * [[Itiya Darbus]] (During ''[[The Big, Unseen Monster]]'')
== {{XC3FR|sub}} == === Normal Minor Enemy === * [[Rabejan Darbus]]
=== Unique Monster === * [[Gotthard, the Ethereal]] ([[Superboss]])
== Gallery == <gallery> XC3 Fang-King Clavein.png|Fang-King Clavein XC3 Itiya Darbus.png|Itiya Darbus GotthardTheEthereal.jpg|Gotthard, the Ethereal </gallery> {{clr}}
{{xc3 stub}}
[[Category:XC3 Species]] [[Category:XC3 Darbuses]] [[Category:XC3 Terrestrial Life]] [[Category:XC3 Humanoids]] [[Category:XC3FR Species]] [[Category:XC3FR Darbuses]] [[Category:XC3FR Terrestrial Life]] [[Category:XC3FR Humanoids]] [[Category:Darbuses]] [[Category:Species by Type]]

{{for|the Accessory in {{XC2|-}}|Dark Orb (XC2)}}
|-|Common = {{Infobox item |name = Dark Orb |image = XC3 Accessory Ring.png |caption = Boosts damage dealt while an ally is incapacitated by 50%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Common |source = |sell = 1540 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Rare = {{Infobox item |name = Dark Orb |image = XC3 Accessory Ring.png |caption = Boosts damage dealt while an ally is incapacitated by 55%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Rare |source = |sell = 1540 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Legendary = {{Infobox item |name = Dark Orb |image = XC3 Accessory Ring.png |caption = Boosts damage dealt while an ally is incapacitated by 60%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Legendary |source = |sell = 1540 [[Gold|G]] }}
'''Dark Orbs''' are [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Accessories]] [[Category:XC3FR Accessories]]

revision.comment: added master art tag to Myopic Screen for ease of reference
revision.text:
{{for|the status in {{XC|-}}|Daze (XC1)}} [[File:XC3 Daze Icon.png|thumb|Daze Icon]] '''Daze''' is a status in {{XC3}} which stuns a target that has been inflicted with [[Topple (XC3)|Topple]]. While stunned, the target cannot dodge attacks, so attackers can hit the dazed target with 100% accuracy. Dazed enemies can be sent into the air spinning with [[Burst]] and will have [[Enraged]] effects removed (along with providing bonus item drops).
== Daze-inflicting Arts == * [[Myopic Screen (XC3)|Myopic Screen]] ([[Medic Gunner]], Master Art) * [[Detonating Hit]] ([[Martial Artist]]) * [[Shining Halo]] ([[Mio]], [[Ouroboros]]) * [[Ether Collider]] ([[Eunie]], [[Ouroboros]]) * [[Electric Skin]] ([[Soulhacker]])
[[Category:XC3 Status]]
{{xc3 stub}}

{{Infobox XC3 Status |title = Debuff Barrier |image = XC3 Debuff Barrier.png |caption = Nullifies set no. of enemy debuffs. |type = Buff |base-duration = 20.0s |max-duration = 40.0s |rng-applicable = Yes |effect-title-1 = Base No. of Debuffs Blocked |effect-value-1 = 1 }} '''Debuff Barrier''' is a [[Status Effect]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. It nullifies a number of debuffs that are applied on the affected character, after which the buff is removed.
It has similar effects to the [[Debuff Immunity]] status effect in {{XC}}.
==Distribution== ===Arts=== *[[Cure Bullet (XC3)|Cure Bullet]] ([[War Medic]])
[[Category:XC3 Status]] [[Category:XC3FR Status]]
{{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}}

{{For|the buff in {{XCX|-}}|Decoy (XCX)}} {{Infobox XC3 Status |title = Decoy |image = XC3 Decoy.png |caption = Evade attacks set no. of times. |type = Buff |base-duration = 20.0s |max-duration = 40.0s |rng-applicable = Yes |effect-title-1 = Base No. of Attacks Evaded |effect-value-1 = 1 }} '''Decoy''' is a [[Status Effect]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. It guarantees the affected character will evade a set number of attacks aimed at them, after which the buff is removed.
== Distribution == ''The playable party has no means of attaining the buff outside of random methods.''
=== Enemy-only Arts === * Pew Pew ([[Pippito]] family) * Hazy Figure ([[Agnus Healer]]) †
† The [[Hazy Figure]] [[Battle Arts (XC3)|Art]] used by the [[Tactician]] class does not grant Decoy.
[[Category:XC3 Status]] [[Category:XC3FR Status]]
{{fr stub}}

{{Infobox quest |name = Defenders' Gut-Check |image = XC3 Challenge Battle Mode.png |description = "Mock battle with Levnises unfold near Colony 9! Key point is to defend allies from mighty attacks of!" |giver = [[Nopon Archsage]] |location = [[Land of Challenge (XC3)|Land of Challenge]] |difficultyCB3 = 1 |rewards = 150-300 [[Noponstone]]s (Easy)
300-600 [[Noponstone]]s (Normal)
450-900 [[Noponstone]]s (Hard) }} '''Defenders' Gut-Check''' is a Time Attack [[Challenge Battle Mode|Challenge Battle]] in {{XC3}}. It can be received from [[Nopon Archsage]] in the [[Land of Challenge (XC3)|Land of Challenge]], available as downloadable content from the second part of the Expansion Pass. Clearing this challenge with at least an A rank for the first time will unlock the Swimwear A outfit for [[Noah]]. == Challenge Rules == {| class="xc1" | Waves || 3 |- | Level Restriction || Lv 20 |} == Times == {| class="xc1" | Rank || Time |- | S || 3:00(Easy), 4:00(Normal), 6:30(Hard) |- |A |4:30(Easy), 6:00(Normal), 9:30(Hard) |- |B |6:00(Easy), 8:00(Normal), 12:30(Hard) |} == Enemies == {| class="xc1" ! Wave ! Enemy ! Level |- | rowspan="2" | 1 || [[Avis]] x1 || 20 |- | [[Equites]] x1 || 20 |- | rowspan="2" | 2 || [[Sagittarius]] x1 || 22 |- | [[Testudo]] x1 || 22 |- | rowspan="2" | 3 || [[Ulula]] x 1|| 25 |- | [[Centuris]] x1 || 25 |} [[Category:XC3 Challenge Battles]]

'''Defense Cuffs''' are [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Accessories]] [[Category:XC3FR Accessories]]
